section.title: Windows
section.p: Tjaelemedïrrege jåhta programmine mah Windowsen systeemestaeriedæjjam dåarjoeh. Vuesiehtæmman Mail jïh Internet Explorerisnie jïh Edgesne.
Goh leah Divvunsijjiedehtijem veedtjeme, aelkehth dle dam jïh veeljh staeriedæjja-gïelem.
section.note: Tjaelemedïrrege ij daejnie programmine LibreOfficesne jïh Microsoft Wordesne juhtieh. Tjaelemedïrregh daejtie programmide gaavnhdás.

section.title: macOS
section.p: Tjaelemedïrrege jåhta programmine mah Macen systeemestaeriedæjjam dåarjoeh (jeenemes programmh).
Goh leah Divvunsijjiedehtijem veedtjeme, aelkehth dle dam jïh veeljh staeriedæjja-gïelem.
section.note: Tjaelemedïrrege ij daejnie programmine LibreOfficesne ïh Microsoft Wordesne juhtieh. Tjaelemedïrregh daejtie programmide gaavnh dás.

section.title: Linux
section.p: Staeriedæjjah mah Linuxine juhtieh.Gaajhkh programmh leah daesnie.
Guktie staeriedæjjam Linuxinie bigkedh, daesnie gaavnh: daesnie.
